Class WordService

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<Word>

    public class WordService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<Word>
    Created by jasonjohns on 12/5/14. Service layer for the creation, update and deletion operations of Word objects

      • getResults

        public java.util.List<Word> getResults(java.lang.String query)
        Specified by:
        getResults in interface Service<Word>
        Parameters:
        query - String
        Returns:
        List of words Executes a simple `contains` query for all words in the dictionary. All results are processed using a levenshtein distance implementation and list is sorted by the edit distances of the results

        Returns:

      • sortByEditDistance

        public java.util.List<Word> sortByEditDistance(java.lang.String query)
        Parameters:
        query - String
        Returns:
        list of words sorted by edit distance to `query` Executes a getResults(query) operation, and sorts the results.

      • sortByEditDistance

        public java.util.List<Word> sortByEditDistance(java.util.List<Word> wordList,
                                      java.lang.String query)
        Parameters:
        wordList - List of words, from any source
        query - String
        Returns:
        List of words sorted by edit distance to `query` Sorts the provided wordList into order of edit distance
